document.full_text: after easily defeating shane mosley, it is becoming increasingly difficult for manny pacquiao to find compelling matchups with fighters not named floyd mayweather jr.
document.title: after a ho-hum victory, pacquiao is running out of challengers
lines_and_colors: after easily defeating shane mosley, it is becoming increasingly difficult for manny pacquiao to find compelling matchups with fighters not named floyd mayweather jr.
